name: testRoom (Yandamen)
description:
Using the timestop ability mess with barrels and cubes. You can stop time and accelerate things to infinity! Preheat barrels! Try gathering all the barrels together and launch yourself to heights no one even dreamt before.

WASD for walking Q and E for hiding/showing gun G for stop/start time Left Mouse to shoot Right Mouse to Grab

I'd be happy if you commented any kind of feedback.
